caption.p: Molecular docking interaction between the SARS-CoV-2 M pro and imidazolidin-4-one, 2-imino-1-(4-methoxy-6-dimethylamino-1,3,5-triazin-2-yl). The ligand in the active site is shown in purple color and the ligand interacting with the residues is shown in blue color, green color illustrates the residues forming hydrogen bonds, and white color illustrates the residues with carbonâ€“hydrogen interaction.
